p: The statistical analysis was done by One way ANOVA followed by Tukey’s t-test at 95% level of confidence using IBM SPSS Statistics Data editor Version 20 in case of acute oral toxicity study, antimicrobial activity of organic extracts and antimicrobial evaluation against MDR clinical isolates. Standard error of means (SEM) was applied to Table 2, 3, 4, 5 and 6 using Microsoft excel, 2010 and IC 50 in the in vitro cytotoxicity assay was calculated using Microsoft excel, 2010.
